about.heading: About This Page
about.welcomeDescription: Welcome to Pineapple IPTV, your personal platform for enjoying IPTV (Internet Protocol Television) on your LG Smart TV. This is a solo project, created and crafted by me with the mission to make watching your favorite channels a delightful and hassle-free experience.
about.specialDescription: Pineapple IPTV brings a touch of joy to your entertainment experience. With my user-friendly tool, you can seamlessly upload your personalized M3U playlist directly to your LG Smart TV. It's a simple and fun way to curate your channel lineup!
about.chooseLanguage: Choose your language (English, Swedish, French, or soon to come, Chinese) and securely upload your M3U playlist.
about.securityNote: Enhance the security of your playlist by setting a personalized email and a 4-digit code. Your data is safe with Pineapple IPTV!
about.downloadToLGSmartTV: Download on Your LG Smart TV:
about.enjoyChannels: Once uploaded, your playlist is ready for download on your LG Smart TV. Enjoy your favorite channels in a snap!
about.userFriendlyDescription: My tool is designed with simplicity in mind. Whether you're a tech enthusiast or a casual user, Pineapple IPTV is for everyone.
about.secureStorageDescription: Your data is precious. Pineapple IPTV provides a secure database for your playlists, ensuring privacy and peace of mind.
about.multilingualSupportDescription: Choose from multiple languages to customize your Pineapple IPTV experience.
about.soloEndeavor: This project is a solo endeavor, a labor of love created for enthusiasts by an enthusiast. I believe in the joy of watching TV, and I'm excited to share it with you.
about.contactInfo: Have questions or feedback? Reach out to me at support@pineappleiptv.com. I'd love to hear from you!
